# greatai.dev

> Technical blog by Alexander Primak covering AI, high-performance data grids, and software for finance.

## About

This site contains technical articles on:
- AI in production: LLM integration, autonomous agents, reliability patterns
- Data grids: High-performance rendering, virtualization, real-time updates
- Finance tech: Trading systems, analytics dashboards, financial workflows

## Author

Alexander Primak - Software engineer building AI-powered trading tools and high-performance data infrastructure.

- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexander-primak/
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/alprimak
- GitHub: https://github.com/alprimak

## Products

- AskTurret: AI-powered trading terminal
- AskTurret Grid: High-performance data grid component

Blog posts are available at /blog
